Windlord::

Windlord saw at Aerotaur and he flew quickly where Aerotaur was and 
said "Do you need any help?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He takes off flying through the air in robot mode.  When he 
arrives at 
> the clearing he returns to bird mode and picks up the CR chamber 
from where 
> he left it.  He takes off and circles around waiting for Windlord 
to arrive.
